object.name: PRESENT_WX_000
object.label: Cloud development not observed during past hour

object.name: PRESENT_WX_002
object.label: State of sky unchanged during last hour

object.name: PRESENT_WX_006
object.label: Widespread dust in suspension in air

object.name: PRESENT_WX_007
object.label: Dust or sand raised by wind

object.name: PRESENT_WX_009
object.label: Dust or sand storm within sight or at station during past hour

object.name: PRESENT_WX_014
object.label: Precipitation within sight, but not reaching ground

object.name: PRESENT_WX_015
object.label: Precipitation within sight, reaching ground at distant station

object.name: PRESENT_WX_017
object.label: Thunder heard, but no precipitation at station

object.name: PRESENT_WX_019
object.label: Funnel cloud(s) within sight during last hour

object.name: PRESENT_WX_020
object.label: Drizzle during past hour but not at observation time

object.name: PRESENT_WX_021
object.label: Rain during past hour but not at observation time

object.name: PRESENT_WX_022
object.label: Snow during past hour but not at observation time

object.name: PRESENT_WX_023
object.label: Rain and snow during past hour but not at observation time

object.name: PRESENT_WX_024
object.label: Freezing rain during past hour but not at observation time

object.name: PRESENT_WX_025
object.label: Rain showers during past hour but not at observation time

object.name: PRESENT_WX_026
object.label: Snow showers during past hour but not at observation time

object.name: PRESENT_WX_027
object.label: Hail and/or rain showers during past hour but not at obs. time

object.name: PRESENT_WX_028
object.label: Fog during past hour, but not at obs time

object.name: PRESENT_WX_029
object.label: Thunderstorm, no precip at observation time

object.name: PRESENT_WX_030
object.label: Slight or moderate dust or sand storm decreasing

object.name: PRESENT_WX_031
object.label: Slight or moderate dust or sand storm

object.name: PRESENT_WX_032
object.label: Slight or moderate dust or sand storm increasing

object.name: PRESENT_WX_033
object.label: Severe dust or sand storm decreasing

object.name: PRESENT_WX_035
object.label: Severe dust or sand storm increasing

object.name: PRESENT_WX_036
object.label: Slight or moderate drifting snow, generally low height

object.name: PRESENT_WX_037
object.label: Heavy drifting snow, generally low height

object.name: PRESENT_WX_038
object.label: Slight or moderate drifting snow, generally high height

object.name: PRESENT_WX_042
object.label: Fog, sky discernible, fog getting thinner

object.name: PRESENT_WX_043
object.label: Fog, sky not discernible, fog getting thinner

object.name: PRESENT_WX_047
object.label: Fog getting thicker, sky not discernible

object.name: PRESENT_WX_049
object.label: Fog depositing rime, sky not discernible

object.name: PRESENT_WX_051
object.label: Continuous drizzle, slight at observation time

object.name: PRESENT_WX_052
object.label: Intermittent drizzle, slight at observation time

object.name: PRESENT_WX_053
object.label: Continuous drizzle, moderate as observation time

object.name: PRESENT_WX_054
object.label: Intermittent drizzle, thick at observation time

object.name: PRESENT_WX_055
object.label: Continuous drizzle, thick at observation time

object.name: PRESENT_WX_068
object.label: Rain or drizzle and snow, slight

object.name: PRESENT_WX_069
object.label: Rain mixed with snow, moderate or heavy

object.name: PRESENT_WX_083
object.label: Slight showers of rain and snow mixed

object.name: PRESENT_WX_084
object.label: Moderate or heavy showers of rain and snow mixed

object.name: PRESENT_WX_090
object.label: Moderate or heavy showers of hail mixed with rain or snow

object.name: PRESENT_WX_091
object.label: Slight rain with thunderstorms during past hour

object.name: PRESENT_WX_092
object.label: Moderate or heavy rain with thunderstorm during past hour

object.name: PRESENT_WX_093
object.label: Slight hail at observation time, thunderstorm during past hour

object.name: PRESENT_WX_094
object.label: Heavy rain at observation time thunderstorm during past hour

object.name: PRESENT_WX_095
object.label: Slight or mod thinderstorm with rain

object.name: PRESENT_WX_096
object.label: Slight or mod thunderstorm with hail at observation time

object.name: PRESENT_WX_097
object.label: Heavy thunderstorm without hail and rain at observation time

object.name: PRESENT_WX_098
object.label: Thunderstorm combined with dust or sandstorm

object.name: PRESENT_WX_099
object.label: Heavy thunderstorm with hail at observation time

object.name: PRESENT_WX_103
object.label: Slight snow at observation time, thunderstorm during past hour

object.name: PRESENT_WX_104
object.label: Heavy snow at observation time, thunderstorm during past hour

object.name: PRESENT_WX_105
object.label: Slight or Mod Thunderstorm with Snow

object.name: PRESENT_WX_107
object.label: Heavy thunderstorm without hail and snow at observation time

object.name: PRESENT_WX_203
object.label: Unknown precipitation from an automatic station

object.name: CLOUD_TYPE_01
object.label: L1 Clouds: Cumulus (Cu) with little vertical extent

object.name: CLOUD_TYPE_02
object.label: L2 Clouds: Cumulus (Cu) of moderate/strong development

object.name: CLOUD_TYPE_04
object.label: L4 Clouds: Stratocumulus (Sc) from spreading out of Cumulus (Cu)

object.name: CLOUD_TYPE_05
object.label: L5 Clouds: Stratocumulus (Sc) not from spreading out of Cumulus (Cu)

object.name: CLOUD_TYPE_07
object.label: L7 Clouds: Stratus fractus (StFra) and/or Cumulus fractus (CuFra) of bad weather

object.name: CLOUD_TYPE_08
object.label: L8 Clouds: Cumulus (Cu) and Stratocumulus (Sc) at different heights

object.name: CLOUD_TYPE_12
object.label: M2 Clouds: Thick altostratus (As) or Nimbostratus (Ns)

object.name: CLOUD_TYPE_14
object.label: L4 Clouds: Stratocumulus (Sc) from spreading out of Cumulus (Cu)

object.name: CLOUD_TYPE_15
object.label: M5 Clouds: Altocumulus (Ac) progressively invading the sky

object.name: CLOUD_TYPE_16
object.label: M6 Clouds: Altocumulus (Ac) from spreading out of Cumulus (Cu)

object.name: CLOUD_TYPE_17
object.label: M7 Clouds: Altocumulus (Ac) in Layers or with As or Ns

object.name: CLOUD_TYPE_18
object.label: M8 Clouds: Altocumulus (Ac) with tufts or sproutings

object.name: CLOUD_TYPE_19
object.label: M9 Clouds: Altocumulus (Ac) of a chaotic sky

object.name: CLOUD_TYPE_23
object.label: H3 Clouds: Dense cirrus (Ci) from Cumulonimbus (Cb)

object.name: CLOUD_TYPE_24
object.label: H4 Clouds: Cirrus (Ci) progressively invading the sky

object.name: CLOUD_TYPE_25
object.label: H5 Clouds: Cirrostratus (Cs) increasing but below 45 elevation

object.name: CLOUD_TYPE_26
object.label: H6 Clouds: Cirrostratus (Cs) increasing and above 45 elevation

object.name: CLOUD_TYPE_27
object.label: H7 Clouds: Cirrostratus (Cs) covering the whole sky

object.name: CLOUD_TYPE_28
object.label: H8 Clouds: Cirrostratus (Cs) not invading or covering the sky

object.name: DASHED_ARROW
object.label: Dashed Line with open arrow head

object.name: DASHED_ARROW_FILLED
object.label: Dashed Line with filled arrow head

object.name: FILL_OPEN_BOX
object.label: Filled Box-Open Box with filled arrow head
